verses.verse: In the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of the reign <S%H4438><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Belshazzar <S%H1112><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, even unto me <S%H589><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> after that <S%H310><s%> which appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me at the first. <S%H8462><s%>

And I saw <S%H7200><s%> in a vision; <S%H2377><s%> and it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when I saw, <S%H7200><s%> that I <S%H589><s%> was at Shushan <S%H7800><s%> in the palace, <S%H1002><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the province <S%H4082><s%> of Elam; <S%H5867><s%> and I saw <S%H7200><s%> in a vision, <S%H2377><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the river <S%H180><s%> of Ulai. <S%H195><s%>

Then I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the river <S%H180><s%> a <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> which had two horns: <S%H7161><s%> and the two horns <S%H7161><s%> were high; <S%H1364><s%> but one <S%H259><s%> was higher <S%H1364><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the other, <S%H8145><s%> and the higher <S%H1364><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> last. <S%H314><s%>

I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> pushing <S%H5055><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> and northward, <S%H6828><s%> and southward; <S%H5045><s%> so that no <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> might stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, neither <S%H369><s%> was there any that could deliver <S%H5337><s%> out of his hand; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> but he did <S%H6213><s%> according to his will, <S%H7522><s%> and became great. <S%H1431><s%>

And as I <S%H589><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> considering, <S%H995><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> a he goat <S%H6842><s%> <S%H5795><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the west <S%H4628><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth, <S%H776><s%> and touched <S%H5060><s%> not <S%H369><s%> the ground: <S%H776><s%> and the goat <S%H6842><s%> had a notable <S%H2380><s%> horn <S%H7161><s%> between <S%H996><s%> his eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And he came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> that had <S%H1167><s%> two horns, <S%H7161><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had seen <S%H7200><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the river, <S%H180><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him in the fury <S%H2534><s%> of his power. <S%H3581><s%>

And I saw <S%H7200><s%> him come close <S%H5060><s%> unto <S%H681><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and he was moved with anger <S%H4843><s%> against <S%H413><s%> him, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> <S%H853><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> horns: <S%H7161><s%> and there was <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> in the ram <S%H352><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, but he cast him down <S%H7993><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> and stamped upon <S%H7429><s%> him: and there was <S%H1961><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> that could deliver <S%H5337><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> out of his hand. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Therefore the he goat <S%H6842><s%> <S%H5795><s%> waxed very great: <S%H1431><s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3966><s%> and when he was strong, <S%H6105><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> horn <S%H7161><s%> was broken; <S%H7665><s%> and for <S%H8478><s%> it came up <S%H5927><s%> four <S%H702><s%> notable ones <S%H2380><s%> toward the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

And out of <S%H4480><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them came forth <S%H3318><s%> a <S%H259><s%> little <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4704><s%> horn, <S%H7161><s%> which waxed exceeding great, <S%H1431><s%> <S%H3499><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the south, <S%H5045><s%> and toward <S%H413><s%> the east, <S%H4217><s%> and toward <S%H413><s%> the pleasant <S%H6643><s%> land.

And it waxed great, <S%H1431><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and it cast down <S%H5307><s%> some of <S%H4480><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> the stars <S%H3556><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> and stamped upon <S%H7429><s%> them.

Yea, he magnified <S%H1431><s%> himself even to <S%H5704><s%> the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the host, <S%H6635><s%> and by <S%H4480><s%> him the daily <S%H8548><s%> sacrifice was taken away, <S%H7311><s%> and the place <S%H4349><s%> of his sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> was cast down. <S%H7993><s%>

And a host <S%H6635><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> him against <S%H5921><s%> the daily <S%H8548><s%> sacrifice by reason of transgression, <S%H6588><s%> and it cast down <S%H7993><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> to the ground; <S%H776><s%> and it practiced, <S%H6213><s%> and prospered. <S%H6743><s%>

Then I heard <S%H8085><s%> one <S%H259><s%> saint <S%H6918><s%> speaking, <S%H1696><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> saint <S%H6918><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto that certain <S%H6422><s%> saint which spoke, <S%H1696><s%> How long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall be the vision <S%H2377><s%> concerning the daily <S%H8548><s%> sacrifice, and the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of desolation, <S%H8074><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> both the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and the host <S%H6635><s%> to be trodden under foot? <S%H4823><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Unto <S%H5704><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> days; <S%H6153><s%> <S%H1242><s%> then shall the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> be cleansed. <S%H6663><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when I, even I <S%H589><s%> Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> had seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the vision, <S%H2377><s%> and sought <S%H1245><s%> for the meaning, <S%H998><s%> then, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man. <S%H1397><s%>

And I heard <S%H8085><s%> a man's <S%H120><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the banks of Ulai, <S%H195><s%> which called, <S%H7121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Gabriel, <S%H1403><s%> make this <S%H1975><s%> man to understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H853><s%> the vision. <S%H4758><s%>

So he came <S%H935><s%> near <S%H681><s%> where I stood: <S%H5977><s%> and when he came, <S%H935><s%> I was afraid, <S%H1204><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> my face: <S%H6440><s%> but he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Understand, <S%H995><s%> O son <S%H1121><s%> of man: <S%H120><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end <S%H7093><s%> shall be the vision. <S%H4758><s%>

Now as he was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me, I was in a deep sleep <S%H7290><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground: <S%H776><s%> but he touched <S%H5060><s%> me, and set <S%H5975><s%> me upright. <S%H5921><s%> <S%H5977><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will make thee know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the last end <S%H319><s%> of the indignation: <S%H2195><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> at the time appointed <S%H4150><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> shall be.
The ram <S%H352><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou sawest <S%H7200><s%> having <S%H1167><s%> two horns <S%H7161><s%> are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Media <S%H4074><s%> and Persia. <S%H6539><s%>

And the rough <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H6842><s%> is the king <S%H4428><s%> of Greece: <S%H3120><s%> and the great <S%H1419><s%> horn <S%H7161><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is between <S%H996><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> is the first <S%H7223><s%> king. <S%H4428><s%>

Now that being broken, <S%H7665><s%> whereas four <S%H702><s%> stood up <S%H5975><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> it, four <S%H702><s%> kingdoms <S%H4438><s%> shall stand up <S%H5975><s%> out of the nation, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1471><s%> but not <S%H3808><s%> in his power. <S%H3581><s%>

And in the latter time <S%H319><s%> of their kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> when the transgressors <S%H6586><s%> are come to the full, <S%H8552><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> of fierce <S%H5794><s%> countenance, <S%H6440><s%> and understanding <S%H995><s%> dark sentences, <S%H2420><s%> shall stand up. <S%H5975><s%>

And his power <S%H3581><s%> shall be mighty, <S%H6105><s%> but not <S%H3808><s%> by his own power: <S%H3581><s%> and he shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> wonderfully, <S%H6381><s%> and shall prosper, <S%H6743><s%> and practice, <S%H6213><s%> and shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> the mighty <S%H6099><s%> and the holy <S%H6918><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

And through <S%H5921><s%> his policy <S%H7922><s%> also he shall cause craft <S%H4820><s%> to prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and he shall magnify <S%H1431><s%> himself in his heart, <S%H3824><s%> and by peace <S%H7962><s%> shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> many: <S%H7227><s%> he shall also stand up <S%H5975><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the Prince <S%H8269><s%> of princes; <S%H8269><s%> but he shall be broken <S%H7665><s%> without <S%H657><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And the vision <S%H4758><s%> of the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was told <S%H559><s%> is true: <S%H571><s%> wherefore shut thou up <S%H859><s%> <S%H5640><s%> the vision; <S%H2377><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it shall be for many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And I <S%H589><s%> Daniel <S%H1840><s%> fainted, <S%H1961><s%> and was sick <S%H2470><s%> certain days; <S%H3117><s%> afterward I rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> business; <S%H4399><s%> and I was astonished <S%H8074><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the vision, <S%H4758><s%> but none <S%H369><s%> understood <S%H995><s%> it.
